description: Numbers represented by quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 2, 1, 0; 1, 3, 1; 0, 1, 2 ].
links: G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
maple: L := [seq(0,i=1..1)]: for x from -20 to 20 do for y from -20 to 20 do for z from -20 to 20 do if member(2*x^2+2*x*y+3*y^2+2*y*z+2*z^2, L)=false then L := [op(L), 2*x^2+2*x*y +3*y^2+2*y*z+2*z^2] fi: od: od: od: L2 := sort(L): for i from 1 to 100 do printf(`%d,`,L2[i]) od:
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, May 31 2000
